post:
100% Satisfaction Guaranteed or Money Back!

We at EURO-SPACE serve people since 2007 and we know how to deliver Powerful, Fast and Reliable Web Hosting with the Superior Customer Support.

Our managed VPS hosting plans bundled with industry leading software on Supermicro servers packed with ECC-RAM and RAID Drives. Every VPS node is powered by OpenVZ virtualization software.

VPS is completely dedicated to your account. It can be used for a wide variety of purposes, including gaming, virtual (i.e., shared) hosting, hosting of traffic-intensive Web sites and running your own web hosting business.


Our VPS Hosting plans come with up to 100% uptime SLA and 15-Day Full Money Back Guarantee.


All prices are final, no setup or hidden fees, no minimum term contracts, month-to-month subscription payments, anytime cancellation!


EURO-SPACE VPS Hosting Features:

+ Industry Top datacenter in Maidenhead, UK
+ 15 day money back guarantee
+ 24x7 Technical Support
+ FREE dedicated IP address
+ Intel Xeon Multi-Core processors on VPS nodes
+ Registered ECC RAM packed VPS nodes, with generous reserves
+ Fully redundant RAID drive arrays for faster I/O
+ Quality Supermicro servers in our own Colo Cages
+ Never Oversold, your allowances are dedicated to only you
+ Root/Admin Access
+ Unlimited inbound bandwidth
+ FREE Enom Domain Reseller account
+ WHM/Cpanel VPS optimized for just EUR 12.99/ month
+ Choice of OS: CentOS, Debian, Fedora, SUSE, Ubuntu, AltLinux, Arch Linux, Gentoo, Scientific Linux, Slackware
+ FREE OVZ Web Panel for multiple VPS management

FAQ:

Do you allow adult content?
YES, we allow legal adult content


Do you allow Torrents, IRC's, VPN's, and Proxies?
Yes, for now, but this may change if we begin to see abuse.


What locations are available?
Our datacenters are located in the UK, Maidenhead datacenter. We are happy to accommodate any location but do not advertise them as available, they may not be without delays for new equipment. Depending on demand we tend to stock various areas faster than others.


I am currently with a reseller provider and want to offer reseller accounts. Can I create reseller accounts with a VPS?
Yes you can. You will get root access and adding software such as cPanel/WHM makes those tasks much simplier. With cPanel you can create reseller accounts just as you would on a dedicated server.


Do you offer an uptime guarantee?
Yes we offer a 100% uptime SLA guarantee on the Network and VPS hardware node the contains your VPS. As long as you can reach the network and the server, we have done our part. What goes inside your VPs is up to you.


WHY EURO-SPACE?

We have been in this industry since 2007 and we know how is best to run successful business together with our customers. We put the client first in everything we do from tightly controlled and monitored machines to overall network performance. We manage our fastest SuperMicro servers in the UK datacenter designed to be the best in speed and reliability. With us, you never have to worry about your online presence, as we take care of it for you.


HOW DO WE CARE?

Our key factor is a quality. We are fully concentrated to provide the best quality products and services on the competetive market. We're always looking for things we can improve, upgrade and add, to provide you the best and above the expectation.
By being our customer, you have the opportunity to launch your online business without hassle, as we take care on hardware, software and other server technical aspects, as well as provide you the professional 24x7 customer support.

We don't want price to stand in the way of your new online venture and so, we can always provide the best custom solutions, which fits your budget and business needs. In addition, if you decide that you are not completely happy with your hosting solutions, you'll receive your money back without asking any questions.

Our in-house support team is available anytime you need a help. By phone, by chat or by support form, our web hosting experts are here to help you every step of the way.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY?

We do not have the millions-strong customer base, but here are hundreds of them already trusting us, as we do our best to deliver a cost-effective hosting solutions oriented on the quality. This includes fast & professional customer support, serious business attitude to our clients and industry leading technologies delivering best solutions for your business.

Check review sites like Trustpilot to find out what our customers say about us.



Sign up now or visit http://www.euro-space.net/ for more info.
